section.title: Update from SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP2
section.para: Updating from SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP2 with AutoYaST is supported.

section.title: Migrating SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 SP2 with WebYaST Installed via wagon
section.para: For migrating SLES11-SP2 with WebYaST installed to SP3 via wagon, it is necessary to install the WebYaST product metadata before starting the migration. To do so, make sure the packages "sle-11-SP2-WebYaST-release" and "sle-11-SP2-WebYaST-release-cd" are installed. You can ignore, if wagon reports an unknown registration status of WebYaST at the beginning of the migration.

note.para: Without the WebYaST product metadata installed, WebYaST will not be migrated.

section.para: The product metadata are not needed when upgrading SLES via booting the installation media.
